alert.note: Alert for Clay; Duval; St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 7:00PM EDT until June 13 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern St. Johns County in northeastern Florida... Northeastern Clay County in northeastern Florida... Southeastern Duval County in northeastern Florida... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 700 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Guana River State Park to Switzerland, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, World Golf Village, Fleming Island, Nocatee, Durbin, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace and Switzerland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
